text: Aanei laa go nia hagadili o Joel mai i nia adu dangada ga dau mai gi nia adu dangada go Shemaiah, Gog, Shimei, Micah, Reaiah, Baal mo Beerah. Di tagi damana o Assyria go Tiglath Pileser, guu kumi Beerah, di tagi o di hagadili adu dangada, gu hagabagi a mee gi daha mo dono henua.5.4-6 2 Kings 15.29
